title: Estoy experimentando un problema al intentar seleccionar y resaltar títulos o encabezados en Perplexity cuando accedo desde Firefox.
content:
Descripción del Problema:

Estoy experimentando un problema al intentar seleccionar y resaltar títulos o encabezados en Perplexity cuando accedo desde Firefox. Aunque puedo ver el texto correctamente, no puedo seleccionarlo ni resaltarlo con color. Esto impide que pueda copiar el texto.

Detalles Adicionales: 

   Navegador Afectado: Firefox (versión actual: [incluye la versión que estás usando]) 
   Funciona en Otro Navegador: El problema no ocurre cuando uso Chrome. 
   Comportamiento en Archivos Guardados: Si guardo una página de Perplexity como un archivo .htm desde Chrome y la abro con Firefox, el problema persiste. Sin embargo, un archivo .htm antiguo guardado desde Firefox sí permite seleccionar y copiar los encabezados.

title: Firefox app crashes specifically when it reaches a new hour
content: I use firefox beta and noticed that firefox always closes exactly when a new hour hits. The moment it hits say exactly 4:00, 5:00, 6:00, or so on for every hour of the day, the app crashes. I also tried this on the standard firefox and the same thing happens. I even decided to alter my device time in settings and set the time to 11.59 only to have the app crash the moment it turns 12. This is the same for any other time of day I set. I tried changing battery optimization and storage restrictions/optimization and nothing seems to work.
creator: kendrell72796

title: Yahoo on Firefox drops connection but doesn't on Google.
content: In the last 2 weeks you tube or yahoo on firefox either times out or drops about 30 minutes in but when I use you tube or yahoo on Google I don't have this problem. Is there a problem with an extension or security issue that would cause this? Did an update cause this? It's frustrating. It's been happening to my husband on his desktop also. It will tell us we're not connected but when I go the the router it shows connected. I have to exit out of the browser and reload and everything is fine for about 30 minutes and then I have to exit and reload which requires me to sign in again. Just wondering if an update caused this.
